text: brrda phu thi hı mi phakhi khun nan ca klaw wa ha kwa xallxhˌ thrng prasngkh læw sir phwk rea k yxm mi hı mi phakhi khun læa thang brrphburusʹ khxng phwk rea xik dwy læa phwk rea k yxm mi hı sing dı pen thi txng ham nı thanxng nan hæla brrda phu kxn hna phwk khea kdi musa læw cnkrathang phwk khea di lim rs kar lngthosʹ khxng rea cng klaw theid (muhammad) wa thi phwk than nan mi khwam ru xan dı kranan hrux chanan phwk cea cng ca txng na man xxk ma hı kæ rea phwk than ca mi ptibati tam sing dı nxkcak kar khad khid xea theanan læa phwk than mimi xun dı nxkcak ca klaw thec theanan
